title: Industries Minister MB Patil says Toyota with Karnataka as automakers big ticket investment in Maharashtra sparks concerns
description: The company may have chosen to invest in Maharashtra as part of its expansion plans, influenced by favours such as logistics. It was natural for industries to expand their operations to meet growing demands, and Toyota was no exception, Patil said.
